t: What is Lionsgate Play on Amazon Prime Video and why do I have to pay its subscription fees to watch movies on Prime Video if I have already subscribed to Prime Video? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): It is a collaboration between Lionsgate and Prime. You do not have to pay for movies which are on Prime, but you have to pay for movies for Lionsgate.
